setting.name: Group Component Type
setting.description: The type of components that are to be used for this group. (Only one is allowed.)

setting.name: Group Components
setting.description: A list of components of a single type that will be included in this group.

setting.name: Group Preprocess Script File
setting.description: The name of a script (only one) that will be used for preprocessing this type of component.

setting.name: Group Post Process Scripts
setting.description: A list of a scripts that can be used for a varity of postprocessing on this type of component.

setting.name: Use Group Preprocess Script
setting.description: Use preprocessing script on incoming component text for this group.

setting.name: Use Group Macros
setting.description: Use group-level macros for rendering text for this group.

setting.name: Use Group Illustrations
setting.description: Use illustrations in this group text.
